name: Acarn
description:
Introduction

Approach

Descent

Exit

The exit from this canyon could not be easier. After the last abseil, there is about 10 minutes more easy gorge walking, followed by 2 1 meter toboggans. After these, you will see the water that is taken by the hydro scheme re-enter from DCR. An easy exit can be made using the track to the pump house. Follow this for about 10m to return to your car.
